attributes.action: take further action to safeguard jobs within Corus.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we do not require an offer of £5million towards retraining, we require assistance in maintaining the uk industry before we see an economic collapse of the whole country.
nationalise the industry to take out the profit aspect and keep the revenues within the uk.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "take further action to safeguard jobs within Corus."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20710


Prime Minister's Office
